steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ibpf","text":"Distribute the contents of tube A and B in strips suitable for multichannel use. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cdvgt","text":"In a Half Volume 96-well clear plate add   of the contents of tube A to each well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":41,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d9qc6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"C7CFE900C5CA11ECB542F78929A9C29C","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7tjo3","text":"Place plate in plate reader and add   of B to each well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":36,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"30","error":false,"guid":"DC7D0810C5CA11ECB542F78929A9C29C","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1gdu7","text":"Immediately measure absorbance at 340 nm in kinetic read mode (30 seconds intervals for   at  )","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":88,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":93,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8brmv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"EE49C380C5CA11ECB542F78929A9C29C","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"F0A62A10C5CA11ECB542F78929A9C29C","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"25","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"efvhv","text":"The specific activity of complex I is calculated as nmol min−1 mg−1 of protein according to the following equation:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":60,"length":2},{"style":"sup","offset":65,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fn5jp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5tuet","text":"Enzyme activity (nmol min−1 mg−1) = (Δ Absorbance/min × 1,000)/[(extinction coefficient × volume of sample used in ml) × (sample protein concentration in mg ml−1)].","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":25,"length":2},{"style":"sup","offset":30,"length":2},{"style":"sup","offset":159,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
